DESCRIPTION: A unique resource the player can spend with [#EFFAFF]Focus to activate certain [#60CFFF]Spells.
Holds your collected [#EFFAFF]Soul . By default, the [#EFFAFF]Soul [#EFFAFF]Meter limit is #b6 stored [#EFFAFF]Soul.
[#60CFFF]Dash , [#60CFFF]Ally and [#60CFFF]Spell have no innate effects, but may be given effects from other sources.
